title: Cindy Crawford enjoys lunch in Malibu as daughter Kaia, 18, arrives in LA after Paris Fashion Week
text:
She revealed on her Instagram Wednesday morning that she's happy to be home again in Southern California.

And after sharing photos to Instagram showing her relaxing in her home sauna wearing only a towel, Cindy Crawford treated herself to lunch out.

The supermodel, 53, was snapped at exclusive Soho House in Malibu where LA's movers and shakers like to hang out.

Treating herself: Cindy Crawford, 53, was snapped out for lunch Wednesday at exclusive Soho House in Malibu

Cindy chose a lightweight patterned blouse with a plunging neckline for her outing on the sunny Fall day.

She added high-waist blue jean flares and brown sandal heels.

Her hair was blown out and styled with a center parting and she sported large sunglasses.

Model style: Cindy chose a lightweight patterned blouse with high-waist blue jean flares and brown sandal heels for her outing. Her hair was blown out and she sported large sunglasses

Flew in: Cindy's daughter Kaia Gerber, 18, was seen at Los Angeles International Airport Wednesday after arriving back home from France where she walked at Paris Fashion Week

Meanwhile, Cindy's daughter Kaia Gerber, 18, was seen at Los Angeles International Airport Wednesday after arriving back home from France.

The teen was a regular on the catwalk during Paris Fashion Week.

She was dressed in a striped sweater, jeans and sneakers and added a black overcoat and baseball cap.

Cindy shares Kaia and son Presley, 20, also a model, with husband Rande Gerber.

Good genes: The teen was dressed in a striped sweater, jeans and sneakers and added a black overcoat and baseball cap

Cindy and Rande have been traveling a lot of late, supporting Kaia at fashion weeks in New York, London Milan and Paris.

They were also in New York last week to help pal George Clooney and his wife Amal celebrate their fifth wedding anniversary.

Cindy clearly has been longing to get home and back in her normal routine.

Alongside the sauna snaps she posted, she wrote: 'Missed my morning sauna time. Finally home ❤️.'
description: Cindy chose a lightweight patterned blouse with a plunging neckline for her outing on the sunny Fall day. She added high-waist blue jean flares and brown sandal heels.
